name: Syba SI-ADA24037 Gigabit Ethernet USB Type-A Network Adapter
Features: [Supports LPM (Link Power Management), Supports CDC-ECM, Supports Pair Swap/Polarity/Skew Correction, Crossover Detection 0 amp: Auto-Correction, Supports Link Down Power Saving When Ethernet Cable is Unplugged, Supports Wake-on-LAN and RealWoW!, Supports Hardware CRC (Cyclic Redundancy Check) Function, IEEE: Supports Full Duplex Operation with IEEE 802.3x Flow Control, Supports IEEE 802.1P Layer 2 Priority Encoding, Supports IEEE 802.1Q VLAN Tagging, Compatible with IEEE 802.3, IEEE 802.3u, Supports IEEE 802.3az-2010 (Energy Efficient Ethernet), Microsoft AOAC (Aways On Always Connected): Supports 16-set 128-byte Wake-Up Frame Pattern Exact Matching, Supports Link Change Wake Up, Supports Microsoft WPD (Wake Packet Detection), Supports Protocol Offload (ARP NS), Intel CPPM (Converged Platform Power Management): Supports L1 with 3ms BESL (USB 2.0), Dynamic LTM Messaging (USB 3.0), Supports U1/U2 (USB 3.0), Supports Selective Suspend]
